Header.title: Flood Forecast
Header.paragraph: A flood is an overflow of water that submerges land that is usually dry. In the sense of 'flowing water', the word may also be applied to the inflow of the tide. Floods are an area of study of the discipline hydrology and are of significant concern in agriculture, civil engineering and public health.

About.paragraph: HydroS is interested in highly motivated under-graduate, post-graduate, PhD scholars for research on water resources systems, water security, water management, climate, surface hydrology, machine learning applications and remote sensing. The candidates should have strong learning intentions in design, modeling and management. Knowledge and research experience on mathematical programming, data analysis and stochastic modeling would be a plus. Candidates for PhD should have post-graduate degrees in water resources/hydrology/environmental/GIS&RS or related fields
